hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Farore's Wind# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ East Inner Room Freestanding Key

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Deku Tree#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Fish Bottle# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Wallet#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
